title: Still so many bots in aram
body: Over the last 40 aram games ive played there has been around 20 bots thought all 40 games... how come this is still a thing? its been 9 months... how come nothing has changed! i just wanna enjoy arams and not have to deal with bots messing everything up!!! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What level are you and what is your win/loss ratio? You should eventually be a in a MMR with players only.

> [{quoted}](name=Vier,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=A4NIeiXM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-12T23:28:32.380+0000)
>
> What level are you and what is your win/loss ratio? You should eventually be a in a MMR with players only.

Player only games is where the bots are, OP means kids starting new accounts and running cheats on them to level them up and usually only used in ARAM.

> [{quoted}](name=Plutooh,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=A4NIeiXM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-16T22:59:38.047+0000)
>
> Player only games is where the bots are, OP means kids starting new accounts and running cheats on them to level them up and usually only used in ARAM.

Exactly what i ment

It's been going on as others have said for years, Riot don't know how to fix the problem which is why they haven't said anything to the PAYING customers end of the day I play for fun so I only play ARAM = No more spending money on the game until the issue is fixed.

Gotta love that this post and my comment got downvoted (i just brought it up from 0) for no apparent reason other than Rito ass kissing.

It's a legitimate issue but who cares Rito ass to kiss.

9 months?

Dude it's been years, but riot doesn't give a shit.
im sure riot actively bans the bots but its not like its hard to make another league of legends account
